As a tourist from US, my wife and I were looking for a local place to enjoy Asian Fusion as recommended by Yelp.  It's in a good area.  Don't wear anything above jeans/t-shirt/sneakers.  It's only a dum sum menu and prices are very reasonable.  We ordered a lot of food for 2 people and spent around €40 total.  Tasty food.  A hole in the wall place and food is plentiful with speedy service.  Get some hot sauce because you'll need it.  Come without AmEx because they don't accept it (much like most of Barcelona...not that I blame them).
